Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: It is relatively quick, and you can modify your homework and ask questions to it at any time.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Sometimes its answers may not be correct, but it greatly improves learning efficiency. Otherwise, I would not be able to search for suitable and useful learning materials in many cases.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: It is fast and convenient, does not require a lot of pleasantries, has no language barriers, and does not cause shame due to lack of knowledge or inadequate preparation. Sometimes there is a fear of teachers.
